channel.title: Homes on Tropical Plant Pathology
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Tropical Plant Pathology

item.description: Tropical Plant Pathology (TPP, abbrev. Trop Plant Pathol), is the International Journal of the Brazilian Phytopathological Society. TPP is published since 1976, initially as Fitopatologia Brasileira (Brazilian Phytopathology). TPP publishes research on fundamental and applied aspects of plant diseases of interest to international audience and of concern to agricultural, forest and ornamental crops from tropical and subtropical environments. Impact Factor JCR 2017: 0.784 Speed: 39 days from submission to first decision

item.title: Submit a manuscript
item.description: Prior to submitting your manuscript, we ask you to please do the following: Read carefully our Instructions for Authors and check whether your research fits scope and conforms to our policy. Choose among our four article types: Original Article, Short Communication, Review (contact us first) and Letter to the Editor. Follow our formatting standards when preparing the manuscript and associated files such as figures and supplemental materials.

item.title: Access to articles
item.description: Read and download our current collection at SpringerLink Full access to our previous SciELO collection Fito Bras (2001-07) TPP (2008-14) Historical Fitopatol. Bras. collection Forthcoming!

Editorial Board An Editor-in-Chief, two Senior Editors and 26 Section Editors representing 11 countries Emerson M. Del Ponte Editor-in-Chief Universidade Federal de Viçosa, Brazil Jorge Badel Senior Editor Universidade Federal de Viçosa, Brazil F Murilo Zerbini Senior Editor Universidade Federal de Viçosa, Brazil Section EditorsOur team of section editors is composed of 26 Editors covering most fields of studies in Plant Pathology and representing 11 countries (last name alphabetical list)
